00054 /* For interoperability */
00055 struct cfg_interop_param {
00056         char *old_param;
00057         char *new_param;
00058 };
00059 
00060 /* obd_config.c */
00061 int class_find_param(char *buf, char *key, char **valp);
00062 struct cfg_interop_param *class_find_old_param(const char *param,
00063                                                struct cfg_interop_param *ptr);
00064 int class_get_next_param(char **params, char *copy);
00065 int class_match_param(char *buf, const char *key, char **valp);
00066 int class_parse_nid(char *buf, lnet_nid_t *nid, char **endh);
00067 int class_parse_nid_quiet(char *buf, lnet_nid_t *nid, char **endh);
00068 int class_parse_net(char *buf, __u32 *net, char **endh);
00069 int class_match_nid(char *buf, char *key, lnet_nid_t nid);
00070 int class_match_net(char *buf, char *key, __u32 net);
00071 /* obd_mount.c */
00072 int do_lcfg(char *cfgname, lnet_nid_t nid, int cmd,
00073             char *s1, char *s2, char *s3, char *s4);

00077 /****************** User-settable parameter keys *********************/
00078 /* e.g.
00079         tunefs.lustre --param="failover.node=192.168.0.13@tcp0" /dev/sda
00080         lctl conf_param testfs-OST0000 failover.node=3@elan,192.168.0.3@tcp0
00081                     ... testfs-MDT0000.lov.stripesize=4M
00082                     ... testfs-OST0000.ost.client_cache_seconds=15
00083                     ... testfs.sys.timeout=<secs>
00084                     ... testfs.llite.max_read_ahead_mb=16
00085 */
00086 
00087 /* System global or special params not handled in obd's proc
00088  * See mgs_write_log_sys()
00089  */
00090 #define PARAM_TIMEOUT              "timeout="          /* global */
00091 #define PARAM_LDLM_TIMEOUT         "ldlm_timeout="     /* global */
00092 #define PARAM_AT_MIN               "at_min="           /* global */
00093 #define PARAM_AT_MAX               "at_max="           /* global */
00094 #define PARAM_AT_EXTRA             "at_extra="         /* global */
00095 #define PARAM_AT_EARLY_MARGIN      "at_early_margin="  /* global */
00096 #define PARAM_AT_HISTORY           "at_history="       /* global */
00097 #define PARAM_JOBID_VAR            "jobid_var="        /* global */
00098 #define PARAM_MGSNODE              "mgsnode="          /* only at mounttime */
00099 #define PARAM_FAILNODE             "failover.node="    /* add failover nid */
00100 #define PARAM_FAILMODE             "failover.mode="    /* initial mount only */
00101 #define PARAM_ACTIVE               "active="           /* activate/deactivate */
00102 #define PARAM_NETWORK              "network="          /* bind on nid */
00103 #define PARAM_ID_UPCALL         "identity_upcall="  /* identity upcall */
00104 
00105 /* Prefixes for parameters handled by obd's proc methods (XXX_process_config) */
00106 #define PARAM_OST               "ost."
00107 #define PARAM_OSD               "osd."
00108 #define PARAM_OSC               "osc."
00109 #define PARAM_MDT               "mdt."
00110 #define PARAM_HSM               "mdt.hsm."
00111 #define PARAM_MDD               "mdd."
00112 #define PARAM_MDC               "mdc."
00113 #define PARAM_LLITE             "llite."
00114 #define PARAM_LOV               "lov."
00115 #define PARAM_LOD               "lod."
00116 #define PARAM_OSP               "osp."
00117 #define PARAM_SYS               "sys."          /* global */
00118 #define PARAM_SRPC              "srpc."
00119 #define PARAM_SRPC_FLVR         "srpc.flavor."
00120 #define PARAM_SRPC_UDESC        "srpc.udesc.cli2mdt"
00121 #define PARAM_SEC               "security."
00122 #define PARAM_QUOTA             "quota."        /* global */
00123 
00126 #define LUSTRE_MAXFSNAME        8
00127 
00140 static inline int lustre_is_name_valid(const char *name, const int minlen,
00141                                        const int maxlen)
00142 {
00143         const char      *tmp;
00144         size_t          len;
00145 
00146         len = strlen(name);
00147 
00148         if (len < minlen)
00149                 return -1;
00150 
00151         if (len > maxlen)
00152                 return -2;
00153 
00154         for (tmp = name; *tmp != '\0'; ++tmp) {
00155                 if (isalnum(*tmp) || *tmp == '_' || *tmp == '-')
00156                         continue;
00157                 else
00158                         break;
00159         }
00160 
00161         return *tmp == '\0' ? 0 : *tmp;
00162 }
00163 
00176 static inline int lustre_is_fsname_valid(const char *fsname, const int minlen,
00177                                          const int maxlen)
00178 {
00179         return lustre_is_name_valid(fsname, minlen, maxlen);
00180 }
00181 
00194 static inline int lustre_is_poolname_valid(const char *poolname,
00195                                            const int minlen, const int maxlen)
00196 {
00197         return lustre_is_name_valid(poolname, minlen, maxlen);
00198 }
00199 
00200 #endif /* _LUSTRE_PARAM_H */
